name: gatsby-starter-default
description: A simple starter to get up and developing quickly with Gatsby

scripts.theme: cp node_modules/semantic-ui-css/semantic.min.css static && cp node_modules/balloon-css/balloon.min.css static && cp node_modules/decentraland-ui/dist/themes/base-theme.css static&& cp node_modules/decentraland-ui/dist/themes/alternative/light-theme.css static
scripts.build: npm run theme && concurrently -c blue,green -n SERVER,FRONT 'tsc -p .' 'gatsby build'
scripts.start: npm run theme && concurrently -c blue,green -n SERVER,FRONT 'npm run serve' 'npm run develop'
scripts.serve: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.development nodemon --watch src/entities --watch src/server.ts -e ts,json --exec 'ts-node -r dotenv/config.js' src/server
scripts.migrate: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.development ts-node -r dotenv/config.js ./node_modules/node-pg-migrate/bin/node-pg-migrate -j ts -m src/migrations -d CONNECTION_STRING
scripts.production: ./node_modules/node-pg-migrate/bin/node-pg-migrate -m lib/migrations -d CONNECTION_STRING up && NODE_ENV=production node lib/server.js
scripts.push: git push origin master && git push gitlab master
